Abstract: THAT LIGHT, civilized, improbable comedy a lot of us have been waiting for finally has arrived, the National's "Janus." This is good, literate fun, with Margaret Sullavan heading a dandy small cast which should be sending laughter through the National these next two weeks.

Title: Flames Trap 3 Locked-In Tots
Abstract: A flash fire Tuesday noon swept through a two-room kitchenette apartment at 4173 S. Lake Park ave., and critically burned three baby boys who were left alone while their mother went shopping.

Title: 3 Locked-In Tots Burned As Blaze Sweeps Apartment
Abstract: A flash fire Tuesday swept through a two-room kitchenette apartment at 4173 Lake Park ave. Chicago, and critically burned three baby boys who were left alone while their mother went shopping.

Title: Police Hunt Slayer Who Shot Lover
Abstract: The inquest into the death of a Southside clerk, reportedly shot to death in her kitchenette apartment Saturday by a suitor, was continued yesterday to Jan. 4, at Wabash ave., police station.

Title: '1-FAMILY' HOUSE IS ADAPTED FOR 2
Abstract: A departure from the conventional design of two-family houses has been taken at a new development in West Babylon, L.I. The model home has the exterior appearance of a onefamily side-to-side split-level, but actually contains two separate apartments.

Title: Nurse Wounded; Jealous Suitor Seized in Flight
Abstract: Miss Esther Bierkle, 31, a nurse at Passavant hospital, was critically wounded Wednesday in her kitchenette apartment on the fifth floor at 500 Diversey pkwy by a man described by police as a jealous suitor.

Title: 'Horrified' Senate Wives Turn Down Extravagantly Equipped Workroom
Abstract: Senate wives have rejected as "ostentatious" a set of architect's plans for a new workroom, with adjoining exercise room, swimming pool, matron's room and kitchenette in the old Senate Office Building.
